nodes.text: Pride of Selonia was a CR90 corvette of the New Republic Defense Fleet.

In 9 ABY, Pride of Selonia was escorting a New Republic supply convoy en route to Liinade III when the fleet was pulled from hyperspace into the M2934738 system by the Imperial Interdictor cruiser Binder. In the subsequent battle, Pride of Selonia was the first ship of the convoy to be destroyed by Reckoning's barrages.
